s.text: The experience gave Arrigan and Quinn a sense of higher purpose, and what else do you need to know?
The experience gave Arrigan and Quinn a sense of higher purpose, and what else do you need to know?
They are often built by churches as a way to lure people back into the fold, and by spas as a higher form of relaxation, sort of like water aerobics.
